author: thorsten
msg: Removing obsolted theme that is now in the core package

author: danielf
msg: Removed non existing XML schema location to get rid of errors in Eclipse.

author: danielf
msg: The test case for the BlocksManager should be in the same package as the tested class.

author: danielf
msg: Generalized the location in wiring.xml so that any (jdk) URL can be used. URLs are resolved relative to the BlocksManager context. Possibly a SourceResolver and some Sources should be used instead.
I have tested it both with unpackaged blocks (through the file: protocol) and with packaged blocks (through the jar: protocol e.g. "jar:file:/c:/blocks/test.jar!/").
